description: Dashbord for all things postgres in posapi

targets.expr: pg_stat_activity_count{datname=~"$datname", namespace=~"$ns", state=~"idle|idle in transaction|idle in transaction (aborted)"} !=0

sum(rate(node_cpu{instance="$host", mode="iowait"}[$interval])) by (mode)* 100 / scalar(count(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="$host"})) or sum(irate(node_cpu{instance="$host", mode="iowait"}[5m])) by (mode) * 100 / scalar(count(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="$host"}))

sum(rate(node_cpu{instance="$host", mode="user"}[$interval])) by (mode)* 100 / scalar(count(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="$host"})) or sum(irate(node_cpu{instance="$host", mode="user"}[5m])) by (mode) * 100 / scalar(count(node_cpu{mode="user", instance="$host"}))

title: posapi-postgres
